Chapter 4480 - Chapter 4480: 4479 Strong Race

Chapter 4480: 4479 strong race

We can smell and curse any living being that we touch.

Wang Xian was astonished when he heard the words of the cursed demonic spirit.

This was equivalent to me being able to curse all the living beings that I see, hear, and touch.

Wang Xian sensed the energy from the cursed demonic spirit himself.

Their energy seemed to carry a special energy in the darkness. This energy was somewhat similar to the power of divination.

Divination, the power of karma.

The special power of the dark soul and karma.

It was very strange, but it had a very powerful energy.

What Wang Xian didn’t know was that the cursed demonic spirit was an extremely powerful universe in the entire Behemoth Alliance.

Their strange abilities made them the strongest partner in the entire Behemoth Alliance.

Their status in the entire Behemoth Alliance was also very high.

For example, the black-and-white two-headed powerhouse just now belonged to another universe. However, he was the only special powerhouse in his universe.

Therefore, in terms of importance, he couldn’t be compared to the cursed devil spirit at all.

The one who was suppressed by Wang Xian was also the most powerful existence of the cursed demonic spirit.

Although they were powerful, it was difficult for them to level up.

This was because the energy and treasures required for them to level up were too demanding.

Powerful races all had their own restrictions.

However, this did not hinder their strength.

“Tell me in detail how you use the energy in your body.”

Wang Xian spoke to the cursed devil spirit!

“HMM?”

The cursed devil spirit was slightly stunned when it heard Wang Xian’s words.

“Yes, Sir!”

The cursed devil spirit hesitated for a moment before nodding.

In fact, he could tell that Wang Xian was definitely not an expert of the ten days federation.

This was because the abilities of the cursed Devil Spirit were analyzed by the ten days Federation’s Most Powerful Technological Universe, the Mechanical Ascension Universe.

The curse spirit was the biggest nemesis of the Mechanical Ascension Universe.

This was because their curses could ignore the mechanical armor and battleships.

As long as he looked over, he could directly curse and kill the scientists of the Mechanical Ascension Universe.

The Mechanical Ascension Universe naturally analyzed his ability and resisted it.

“The usage of our curse spirit’s energy has something to do with our race’s special talent. We can see the life aura of a living being and clearly smell the life aura of a living being

“Therefore, we capture this aura of life and carry out a curse. The curse will enter a living creature’s body based on its aura of life and carry out a curse to kill it

“Let’s not talk about anything else. The power of our cursed demonic spirit’s curse is definitely the most terrifying existence in all of the universes.”

As the cursed demonic spirit spoke, a proud expression appeared on its face.

Everything I saw, touched, and heard could be cursed.

Most importantly, the power of the curse was hard to defend against.

It was exceptionally difficult to defend against.

Its power of the curse could kill existences stronger than itself.

At the beginning stages of their cultivation, it could kill control level experts.

It could curse by two small levels.

In other words, if it had just stepped into the Great Dao level, it could kill two great dao level experts at the beginning stages of their cultivation.

It was even more powerful and strange than the space of the King of the ten great attributes in the universe.

“It is indeed very powerful.”

Wang Xian nodded his head and used the power of chaos to simulate the body of the cursed demonic spirit.

However, because the energy in his body had yet to be completely converted into the power of chaos, the simulation failed.

He pondered for a moment and directly extracted all the power of chaos in his body.

After removing it, he used it to simulate the cursed demonic spirit.

As expected, the simulation was successful.

After the conversion was successful, Wang Xian focused his attention on it. He realized that he could indeed see the life force of a living creature.

He could easily capture this life force.

“After you capture the life force of the enemy, how do you perform the curse?”

Wang Xian asked him.

“HMM?”

The cursed demonic spirit was a little surprised when he heard Wang Xian’s question. “It’s very simple to cast a curse. You condense the life force into a doll and then attack it. Any attack that falls on the doll will be equivalent to the person being cursed.”

“Alright!”

Wang Xian nodded and understood a little.

“You can go. I Won’t kill you!”

Wang Xian was a man of his word. He waved his hand at the cursed demonic spirit.

“Thank you, sir. Thank you, Sir!”

Upon hearing this, the cursed demonic spirit was extremely excited.

One had to know that if he were to be killed, he would have to pay a huge price to recover.

Being able to preserve his life was equivalent to preserving a lot of resources.

The cursed demonic spirit escaped in an instant.

After the cursed demonic spirit escaped, Wang Xian moved his palm and took out a huge corpse once again.

The body of the giant beast.

Originally, there was an expert who was parasitized in the body of the giant beast.

However, when he saw that there was no hope of escaping, he killed himself to prevent himself from being abused.

Wang Xian sized up the body of the giant beast and discovered that there was a special energy in the body of the giant beast.

However, he did not know how to operate this energy.

The energy was of the wood attribute and had a parasitical effect.

“The parasitical method of the Giant Beast Universe. It seems that I need to capture the powerhouses of the giant beast universe before I can study it.”

Wang Xian mumbled.

This ability of the giant beast universe was also very special and powerful.

“Although I was attacked, the harvest was really good.”

Wang Xian smiled and scanned his surroundings.

The surrounding area was in a mess and was covered by an energy shield.

All the living beings within the energy shield were killed.

“It seems that the situation here is similar to the justice universe. There are also frequent outbreaks of wars.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

However, this had nothing to do with him. He just wanted to see if he could get any good things or treasures here.

Putting everything else aside, he had just obtained the Heaven’s origin creation treasure.

Coupled with the ability of the cursed demonic spirit, it was extremely powerful.

Especially the latter, it was of great use to Wang Xian.

“What a perverse ability.”

Wang Xian’s eyes flickered.

This ability, especially when dealing with existences weaker than him, was completely impossible to guard against.

If the other party wanted to win by outnumbering him, it would be impossible.

For example, 50 experts at the level of Great Dao could easily destroy Wang Xian together.

However, if Wang Xian were to use this curse power, he could easily kill them one by one.

This was because his curses ignored the defense of energy. He could only rely on his physical body and the energy in his body to resist.

It would be difficult for others to help.

Of course, if they could find a special way to help, it would be another story.

At the very least, Wang Xian could be killed easily without knowing the specific situation.

“Continue to the 10-day federation!”

He scanned his surroundings and looked at another black hole teleportation formation. Then, he walked straight over.
